revised_title: Coulomb-Born-Oppenheimer Approximation for Electron Impact Excitation of Positive Ions
tldr: The authors investigate cross-sections for excitation of hydrogenic ions by electron impact using the Coulomb-Born-Oppenheimer (CBO) approximation. They consider exchange effects for all transitions between states involving the 1s and 2s, 2p levels. The calculations are carried out for various nuclear charge numbers, and the results can be used to estimate cross-sections for elastic and inelastic transitions in more complex highly ionized atoms.
